article_title: Why The Danish Girl Is A Must-See

article_metadata.author: Steve Forbes

og.description: The Danish Girl, which has been nominated for four Academy Awards, is one of those movies that hit you hard and then stay with you long after the lights come on.
og.title: Why The Danish Girl Is A Must-See
